summary: showing Prowler\'s Profit and change some ability name on Active Effects Slot..
descriptionHtml:
showing and change some ability name on Active Effects Slot..

 HiSTORY

1.1 Amulets, Rings and Diseases
- change all amulet of gods to \'Diciple of <God>\' rather than \'Fortify <something>\'
- change all diseases to its own name rather than \'Reduced <something>\'
- change Namira\'sRing, Hircine\'sRing and Kyne\'sToken to \'<Daedra>\'s Blessing\'
- change Blessing from Auriel to \'Blessing of Auriel\' rather than \'Fortify Marksman\'

1.0 initial release
- showing Prowler\'s Profit ability, this ability granted after you finish No Stone Unturned Quest, for those who had difficulties completing this quest, use this mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385
- change the ability reward from completing The Book of Love Quest to \'Agent of Mara\' rather than \'Resist Magic\'
- change ability Resist Magic from Alteration Perk to \'Lesser/Greater/MagicResistance\' rather than \'Resist Magic\' also change the description based on what\'s written on the Perks
- change all ability (not power) of any race to \'Race Ability\' rather than \'Resist <something>\'
- change all blessing from any Gods? to \'Blessing of <God\'sName>\' rather than \'Fortify <something>\'

 NOTE
the first idea is only to showing the Prowler\'s Profit, but after seeing what\'s in Active Effects slot i got quite confuse, so i decide to change some ability name, hopely for the better :)

you can use it whatever you wish, as long as you credits me..

 my other mods:
MoreAdvancedArmor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15543/
HuntressRetextures - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14926/

 THANKs
Bethesda, Nexus and TESVSnip..
author: freakX
